channel.title: Culture on Felix
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Felix

item.title: International dance championships
item.author: Felix Editor,Claire Chan,
item.description: What is it about ballroom dancing that so enthrals us? The public’s fascination with ballroom dancing began years ago in Hollywood, with Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers lighting up the silver screen. And as the wild success of TV programs like Strictly Come Dancing and Dancing With The Stars shows, …

item.title: A field guide to the culture tribes of London
item.author: Felix Editor,Fred S Fyles,
item.description: For the uninitiated, London can be a strange and scary place. However, for the ornithologically-inclined, it can be a place of wonder. Let felix be your guide, taking you on a tour of the different culture tribes you can spot in the capital. Bonus points if you manage to see them all! The Techno …
